name: sampler
description: Sample distributions generated by given circuits executed on the target backend.

circuits.description: A single or list of QuantumCircuits.

transpiler_config.description: A collection of kwargs passed to transpile.

run_config.description: A collection of kwargs passed to backend.run.

skip_transpilation.description: Skip circuit transpilation. Default is False.

use_dynamical_decoupling.description: Use dynamical decoupling to improve fidelities.

use_measurement_mitigation.description: Use measurement mitigation to improve results. Default is False.

return_mitigation_overhead.description: Return mitigation overhead factor. Default is False.

counts.description: List of counts data for each circuit given.

quasiprobabilities.description: List of quasiprobabilities returned for each circuit if using measurement mitigation.

mitigation_overhead.description: List of mitigation overhead values for measurement mitigation, if requested.
